name: 王鴻祥
objective:
介紹產品開發的流程與工作的內容，運用產學合作模式，輔導學生實際參與和體驗產業界之產品開發專案，訓練學生團隊合作與問題解決能力。
Introduce Product develop process and C-flow , guide and help students ' active ,training their team work capability , independent thinking and problem-solving skills.
